sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Grid,
  Text,
  Flex,
  Accordion,
  Center,
  Avatar,
  Badge,
  Checkbox,
  Button,
  ColorPicker,
  Input,
  Stack,
  Image,
  Card,
  Slider,
  ActionIcon,
} from "@mantine/core";

import {
  IconPlus,
  IconX,
  IconColumns1,
  IconBold,
  IconUnderline,
  IconItalic,
  IconLetterN,
} from "@tabler/icons-react";
import { Dropzone, IMAGE_MIME_TYPE } from "@mantine/dropzone";

const CustomizeCategoryList1 = () => {
    {
        /* Dropzone */
      }
    
      const [files, setFiles] = useState([]);
    
      const previews = files.map((file, index) => {
        const imageUrl = URL.createObjectURL(file);
        return (
          <Image
            key={index}
            src={imageUrl}
            onLoad={() => URL.revokeObjectURL(imageUrl)}
          />
        );
      });
  return (
    <Accordion m="xs" variant="contained">
              {/* electronics */}
              <Accordion.Item value="electronics">
                <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                  <Flex
                    justify="flex-start"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Checkbox defaultChecked />
                    <Text>Electronics</Text>
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel>
                  <Dropzone
                    accept={IMAGE_MIME_TYPE}
                    onDrop={setFiles}
                    bg="white"
                    h="10rem"
                    style={{
                      position: "relative",
                      border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                      borderRadius: "5px",
                    }}
                  >
                    {previews}
                    <Text
                      style={{
                        position: "absolute",
                        top: "50%",
                        left: "50%",
                        transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)",
                      }}
                    >
                      Drop images here
                    </Text>
                  </Dropzone>

                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                    <ColorPicker mt="xs" w="auto" size="lg" format="rgba" />
                  </Flex>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                    <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Panel>
              </Accordion.Item>
              {/* Accessories */}
              <Accordion.Item value="accessories">
                <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                  <Flex
                    justify="flex-start"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Checkbox defaultChecked />
                    <Text>Accessories</Text>
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel>
                  <Dropzone
                    accept={IMAGE_MIME_TYPE}
                    onDrop={setFiles}
                    bg="white"
                    h="10rem"
                    style={{
                      position: "relative",
                      border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                      borderRadius: "5px",
                    }}
                  >
                    {previews}
                    <Text
                      style={{
                        position: "absolute",
                        top: "50%",
                        left: "50%",
                        transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)",
                      }}
                    >
                      Drop images here
                    </Text>
                  </Dropzone>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                    <ColorPicker mt="xs" w="auto" size="lg" format="rgba" />
                  </Flex>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                    <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Panel>
              </Accordion.Item>
              {/* Clothing */}
              <Accordion.Item value="clothing">
                <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                  <Flex
                    justify="flex-start"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Checkbox defaultChecked />
                    <Text>Clothing</Text>
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel>
                  <Dropzone
                    accept={IMAGE_MIME_TYPE}
                    onDrop={setFiles}
                    bg="white"
                    h="10rem"
                    style={{
                      position: "relative",
                      border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                      borderRadius: "5px",
                    }}
                  >
                    {previews}
                    <Text
                      style={{
                        position: "absolute",
                        top: "50%",
                        left: "50%",
                        transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)",
                      }}
                    >
                      Drop images here
                    </Text>
                  </Dropzone>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                    <ColorPicker mt="xs" w="auto" size="lg" format="rgba" />
                  </Flex>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                    <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Panel>
              </Accordion.Item>
              {/* Shoes */}
              <Accordion.Item value="shoes">
                <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                  <Flex
                    justify="flex-start"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Checkbox defaultChecked />
                    <Text>Shoes</Text>
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel>
                  <Dropzone
                    accept={IMAGE_MIME_TYPE}
                    onDrop={setFiles}
                    bg="white"
                    h="10rem"
                    style={{
                      position: "relative",
                      border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                      borderRadius: "5px",
                    }}
                  >
                    {previews}
                    <Text
                      style={{
                        position: "absolute",
                        top: "50%",
                        left: "50%",
                        transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)",
                      }}
                    >
                      Drop images here
                    </Text>
                  </Dropzone>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                    <ColorPicker mt="xs" w="auto" size="lg" format="rgba" />
                  </Flex>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                    <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Panel>
              </Accordion.Item>
              
              {/* Add More */}
              <Accordion.Item mt="xs" value="addmore">
                <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                  <Flex
                    justify="flex-start"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Text c={`indigo.6`}>+ Add More</Text>
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel>
                  <Dropzone
                    accept={IMAGE_MIME_TYPE}
                    onDrop={setFiles}
                    bg="white"
                    h="10rem"
                    style={{
                      position: "relative",
                      border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                      borderRadius: "5px",
                    }}
                  >
                    {previews}
                    <Text
                      style={{
                        position: "absolute",
                        top: "50%",
                        left: "50%",
                        transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)",
                      }}
                    >
                      Drop images here
                    </Text>
                  </Dropzone>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                    <ColorPicker mt="xs" w="auto" size="lg" format="rgba" />
                  </Flex>
                  <Flex direction="column">
                    <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                    <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                  </Flex>
                </Accordion.Panel>
              </Accordion.Item>
            </Accordion>
  )
}

export default CustomizeCategoryList1
